history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: f,ex_lim_ext_loc. qsimpl time: 1 use: f,ex_lim_ext_loc,filter_forall.

exceptions.exn: In environment T, U : UniformSpace Hfg, Hf : T -> U The term "f" has type "family -> R -> R -> Prop" while it is expected to have type "R -> R" (cannot unify "R" and "family").

In environment H : forall (f g : R -> R) (x : Rbar), Rbar_locally' x (fun y : R => f y = g y) -> ex_lim f x -> ex_lim g x X : family -> R -> R -> Prop T, U : UniformSpace Hfg, Hf : T -> U x : T H0 : forall x : T, Hfg x = Hf x H1 : continuous Hfg x Unable to unify "?F" with "continuous Hf" (unable to find a well-typed instantiation for "?F": cannot ensure that "T -> Prop" is a subtype of "(?T -> Prop) -> Prop").

In environment H : forall (f g : R -> R) (x : Rbar), Rbar_locally' x (fun y : R => f y = g y) -> ex_lim f x -> ex_lim g x X : family -> R -> R -> Prop T, U : UniformSpace Hfg, Hf : T -> U x : T H0 : forall x : T, Hfg x = Hf x H1 : continuous Hfg x H3 : forall P : ?T -> Prop, (forall x : ?T, P x) -> ?F P X0 : family -> R -> R -> Prop y : U -> Prop Unable to unify "T -> U" with "locally (Hf x) y -> filtermap Hf (locally x) y".

In environment H : forall (f g : R -> R) (x : Rbar), Rbar_locally' x (fun y : R => f y = g y) -> ex_lim f x -> ex_lim g x X : family -> R -> R -> Prop T, U : UniformSpace Hfg, Hf : T -> U x : T H0 : forall x : T, Hfg x = Hf x H1 : continuous Hfg x H3 : forall P : ?T -> Prop, (forall x : ?T, P x) -> ?F P X0 : family -> R -> R -> Prop y : U -> Prop H4 : forall P : ?T0 -> Prop, (forall x : ?T0, P x) -> ?F0 P X1 : family -> R -> R -> Prop H5 : locally (Hf x) y Unable to unify "UniformSpace.sort U" with "filtermap Hf (locally x) y".

original: intros Hfg Hf. apply ex_lim_ext_loc with (f := f). - apply filter_forall. intros y. apply Hfg. - apply Hf.
